Package jcifs

Interface SmbRandomAccess

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable, java.io.DataInput, java.io.DataOutput
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SmbRandomAccessFile
    public interface SmbRandomAccess
extends java.io.DataOutput, java.io.DataInput, java.lang.AutoCloseable
    File access that exposes random access semantics
